info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 10 at 7:35PM CDT until May 10 at 8:30PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 830 PM CDT FOR EASTERN ROBERTS AND HEMPHILL COUNTIES... At 735 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 4 miles southeast of Miami, moving north at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to roofs, siding, and trees is possible. Locations impacted include... Canadian, Miami, Glazier, Codman, Lake Marvin and Lora. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
